DOC.HEADLINE: ' CITY OF ANGELS ' FEST AT DIRECTORS GUILD
DOC.TEXT: The first " City of Angels " film festival will be held Sept . 21-24 at the Directors Guild of America , 7920 W . Sunset Blvd.The theme , " Los Angeles in the Movies : Dreams , Conflicts , and Lifestyles , " will feature eight major Hollywood film productions from the last 25 years , focusing_on non-Hollywood Los Angeles , plus several student films . Screenings will include : " Grand_Canyon " on Sept . 21 ; " Boyz N the Hood " and " El Norte " on Sept . 22 ; " L.A. Story " and " American Gigolo " on Sept . 23 , and " Chinatown , " " Stand and Deliver " and " Blade Runner " on Sept . 24 . Information : ( 310 ) 436-1360 .
